question: Show all job postings for nurses and physical therapists which are on the day shift.
sql_query1:
SELECT JobPostings.title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE (JobPostings.healthcare = "Nurse" OR JobPostings.healthcare = "Physical Therapist") AND JobPostings.shift = "Day Shift"
sql_query2:
SELECT JobPostings.title 
FROM JobPostings
WHERE JobPostings.healthcare = "Nurse" OR JobPostings.healthcare = "Physical Therapist" AND JobPostings.shift = "Day Shift"
interpretation1: Show all day shift job postings for nurses and physical therapists.
interpretation2: Show all the job postings for nurses, and just the day shift job postings for physical therapists.
